15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: As the guardian spirit fades, the great stone doors groan open, revealing a vast chamber filled with ancient carvings and forgotten relics.
15.translation: As the guardian spirit fades, the great stone doors groan open, revealing a vast chamber filled with ancient carvings and forgotten relics.
15.scene_description: Dim torchlight flickers across the walls, illuminating intricate Yoruba symbols and artifacts. In the center, a raised pedestal glows with mysterious energy.

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: As Ọmọtẹmi nears the pedestal, the air grows heavy. A golden artifact rests at the center, pulsing with power. It hums as if recognizing her presence.
17.translation: As Ọmọtẹmi nears the pedestal, the air grows heavy. A golden artifact rests at the center, pulsing with power. It hums as if recognizing her presence.
17.scene_description: The artifact glows brighter, as though awaiting her decision.
17.life_spirit_hint: We have to take this back to Ogun
